MPAAss: The smaller one looks terrible compared to this because it has a really low bitrate. That one will look ok in scenes with little movement but otherwise it will be blurry and pixelated while this will look much smoother throughout.

V: 10
A: 10
Movie: 10/10

The (debatably) quintessential action movie, as awesome as always. Transfer is surprisingly good, with expected film grain. File includes a 5.1 DTS audio track and a 2.0 stereo track. Video quality is superb. Well worth the 6.5GB.
